mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (TO_USER) FROM FOLLOWLIST WHERE FROM_USER= #{fromUser}
SELECT COUNT (FROM_USER) FROM FOLLOWLIST WHERE TO_USER= #{toUser}
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM FEED WHERE FEED_WRITER= #{feedWriter}

SELECT USER_ID userId,PROFILE_PATH profilePath, PROFILE_ORIGINNAME profileOriginName, PROFILE_CHANGENAME profileChangeName FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID IN (SELECT TO_USER FROM FOLLOWLIST WHERE FROM_USER = #{userId})

SELECT USER_ID userId,PROFILE_PATH profilePath, PROFILE_ORIGINNAME profileOriginName, PROFILE_CHANGENAME profileChangeName FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID IN (SELECT FROM_USER FROM FOLLOWLIST WHERE TO_USER = #{userId})

SELECT F.FEED_NO, F.FEED_CONTENT, F.FEED_WRITER, F.CREATE_DATE, MIN(FI.CHANGE_NAME) AS CHANGE_NAME, F.FEED_LOCATION FROM FEED F JOIN FEED_IMG FI ON F.FEED_NO = FI.FEED_NO WHERE F.STATUS = 'Y' AND F.FEED_WRITER = #{userId} GROUP BY F.FEED_NO, F.FEED_CONTENT, F.FEED_WRITER, F.CREATE_DATE, F.FEED_LOCATION ORDER BY F.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT F.FEED_NO, F.FEED_CONTENT, F.FEED_WRITER, F.CREATE_DATE, MIN(FI.CHANGE_NAME) AS CHANGE_NAME, F.FEED_LOCATION FROM FEED F JOIN FEED_IMG FI ON F.FEED_NO = FI.FEED_NO JOIN FEED_LIKE FL ON F.FEED_NO = FL.FEED_NO WHERE F.STATUS = 'Y' AND F.FEED_WRITER = #{userId} GROUP BY F.FEED_NO, F.FEED_CONTENT, F.FEED_WRITER, F.CREATE_DATE, F.FEED_LOCATION ORDER BY F.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT F.FEED_NO, F.FEED_CONTENT, F.FEED_WRITER, F.CREATE_DATE, MIN(FI.CHANGE_NAME) AS CHANGE_NAME, F.FEED_LOCATION FROM FEED F JOIN FEED_IMG FI ON F.FEED_NO = FI.FEED_NO JOIN FEED_KEEP FK ON F.FEED_NO = FK.FEED_NO WHERE F.STATUS = 'Y' AND F.FEED_WRITER = #{userId} GROUP BY F.FEED_NO, F.FEED_CONTENT, F.FEED_WRITER, F.CREATE_DATE, F.FEED_LOCATION ORDER BY F.CREATE_DATE DESC
